meanings: (어떤 장소에) be, (건물 등이) stand, be located (in/at), be situated, (도시 등이) lie
(시설·장치 등이) have, (시설이) be equipped with, be provided with

phrases.phrase: 5년 이상의 경력이 있어야 이 분야에 지원할 수 있다
meanings: five or more years of experience is required for this job.

meanings.meaning: you scratch my back and I'll scratch yours
it takes two to do something

vlive.korean: 언니는요? - 있어야 돼? What about you? - Do I have to have one? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: What about you? - Do I have to have one?

vlive.korean: 사이드 - 2개 있어야 되지 않아? Side. - Don't you need two of them? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 그냥🐺
vlive.english: Side. - Don't you need two of them?

vlive.korean: 불빛이 나한테 있는 게 아니라 모모한테 있어야 되는 거 아니야? Shouldn't the light be on MOMO and not on me? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅁㅁㄹ🧸
vlive.english: Shouldn't the light be on MOMO and not on me?

vlive.korean: 뭐예요? 식용유 있어야 되지 않아요? What? Don't we need cooking oil? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: What? Don't we need cooking oil?

vlive.korean: 그리고... - 홍고추 저거 있어야 되지 않아? And... - Don't we need red pepper? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: And... - Don't we need red pepper?
